channel.title: SSO version does not include "Lower Case Column Names in Results" when connecting with Snowflake
channel.description:
Hi all, The hosted version of Redash includes an option to enforce lower case column names in Snowflake's results. This feature is critical for us as due to legacy reasons all of our visualization are using lower case column names, while Snowflake returns column names in upper case. So currently none of our visualization works on the hosted version (as Redash is case sensitive).
Could you kindly advise?
Thank you, Yair

item.title: SSO version does not include "Lower Case Column Names in Results" when connecting with Snowflake
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
I’ve opened a PR to implement this on OSS. snowflake: add option to lowercase column names by susodapop · Pull Request #5657 · getredash/redash · GitHub

Are you able to test this?

Read full topic
item.source: SSO version does not include "Lower Case Column Names in Results" when connecting with Snowflake
